mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.social_number AS "socialNumber", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.desk_phone AS "deskPhone", a.address AS "address", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_owner a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.social_number LIKE '%'||#{socialNumber}||'%' '%'+#{socialNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{socialNumber},'%')
AND a.cell_phone LIKE '%'||#{cellPhone}||'%' '%'+#{cellPhone}+'%' concat('%',#{cellPhone},'%')

AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.social_number AS "socialNumber", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.desk_phone AS "deskPhone" FROM t_owner a
or (a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.social_number = #{socialNumber})
or (a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.cell_phone = #{cellPhone})
or (a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.desk_phone = #{deskPhone})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_owner( id, name, social_number, cell_phone, desk_phone, address, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{socialNumber}, #{cellPhone}, #{deskPhone}, #{address}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_owner SET name = #{name}, social_number = #{socialNumber}, cell_phone = #{cellPhone}, desk_phone = #{deskPhone}, address = #{address}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
